tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Cultural_Exchange_Programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    coordinator_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE programs (
   program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   program_name VARCHAR(100),
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   coordinator_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (coordinator_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE exchange_programs (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(255),
  program_location VARCHAR(255),
  program_start_date DATE,
  program_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(255),
  participant_email VARCHAR(255),
  participant_phone VARCHAR(20),
  program_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES exchange_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE coordinators (
  coordinator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  coordinator_name VARCHAR(255),
  coordinator_email VARCHAR(255),
  program_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES exchange_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE cultural_exchange_programs (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  program_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  program_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES cultural_exchange_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE coordinators (
  coordinator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  coordinator_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  coordinator_email VARCHAR(50),
  program_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES cultural_exchange_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  activity_description TEXT,
  activity_date DATE,
  program_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES cultural_exchange_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);
